article_title: Students giving Google Classroom bad reviews in bid to end homework - Toronto Sun
article_description: Students giving Google Classroom bad reviews in bid to end homework Toronto Sun Google Phone app can now be installed on some non Pixel phones from the Play Store XDA Developers View Full coverage on Google News
article_content: Some rebellious students are taking their dislike of homework to another level While schools remain closed across Canada due to the coronavirus pandemic  electronic learning has begun recently for homebound students through applications like Google Classroo   1914 chars
